ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'I am someone who detests the deed you perpetrate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Lot) said: "I am disgusted with your actions,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "I am one of those who abhor your practice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "I certainly hate what you practice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “I am disgusted with your works.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "I am indeed of those who disapprove with severe anger and fury your behavior."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Surely I am of those who utterly abhor your doing;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Truly I am a detester of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: I am in truth of those who hate your conduct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "I am one of those who abhors your ways.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: verily I am of those who abhor your work.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Indeed I detest your conduct.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "I do detest your doings."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "I am, indeed, of those who disapprove with severe anger and fury your (this evil) action (of sodomy).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Truly, I am a detester of what you do'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I certainly deplore your conduct.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Indeed, I am, toward your deed, of those who detest [it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:168] He, Lot, said, ‘Truly I abhor, I detest, what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Lot said: (I am in truth of those who hate your conduct) your evil conduct.
